job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pSift Media is looking for a proven software developer with excellent data science skillsnbsp Our bidder makes buying decisions on over 50 billion ad requests per daynbsp Our data science helps us bid on the right users at the right timenbsp Targeting is crucial but the methods implemented must be performant enough to execute in realtimenbsp If you enjoy cuttingedge technology massive amounts of data and being part of the small team powering one of the fastestgrowing companies in North Carolina youll probably find this interestingppbrppQUALIFICATIONSpulliBS or MS in Computer Science Mathematics or equivalent work experienceliliPractical Data Science experienceliliExperience with machine learning frameworks such as Amazon MLliliSoftware development experience preferably with a JVM based language Java Scala ClojureliliSolid experience with query languagesliulpp
